title: Print, "Designs for Three Sections of Metal Balcony for Facade of Hotel de Ville, Paris, Receuil des ouvrages en serrurerie..., 1763, page 10, plate 5", 1698–1771

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Designs for Three Sections of Metal Balcony for Facade of Hotel de Ville, Paris, Receuil des ouvrages en serrurerie..., 1763, page 10, plate 5", 1698–1771.
